summary: This mod adds a mobile statue of Mara, that is slightly retextured to look like a Weeping Angel. The Weeping Angel is located in the Temple of Mara in Riften.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a mobile statue of Mara, that is slightly retextured to look like a Weeping Angel. The Weeping Angel is located in the Temple of Mara in Riften.

Don\'t blink.

Check out my mod page: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

Thanks.
author: billmineface
